snippet: ZELMAN--Martin. We have lost our dear friend of many, many years. Marty was much more than a business associate. He was a man of grace and kindness; warm and friendly to everyone--a very special person. Rest in peace. Joan and Jerry 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZELMAN--Martin. We have lost our dear friend of many, many years. Marty was much more than a business associate. He was a man of grace and kindness; warm and friendly to everyone--a very special person. Rest in peace. Joan and Jerry 1/3
